import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login-page', templateUrl: './login-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login-page.component.scss'] }) export class LoginPageComponent { passwordInput: string = "password"; constructor() { } ngOnInit(){ } hideShowPass(){ } }
